plugin-data.name: Contact
plugin-data.description: Add a contact form to Bludit, with the ability to use a custom template.

select-a-page-to-add-the-contact-form: Select a page to add the contact form
name: Name
please-enter-a-valid-email-address: Please enter a valid email address
please-enter-the-content-of-your-message: Please enter the content of your message
thank-you-for-having-contacted-me.-i-wil: Thank you for having contacted me. I will reply you as soon as possible.
oops!-an-error-occurred-while-sending-yo: Oops! An error occurred while sending your message, thank you to try again later.
